title: Compendium: The Horror Challenge Collection
description: Stories inspired by suggestions from readers is at the heart of The Horror Challenge. This collection of tales represents the complete works of Volumes I thru III. While the name says Horror, many of the stories contain twists of humor and irony stirred together to make this one of the most unique collections of stories you will ever read. Once you enter into the world created by J.H. Glaze, you will never look at ordinary objects or situations in the same way again. Prepare to be thrilled, amused, and eager to submit your own challenge. Your imagination is only as strong as you allow it to be, so turn it loose and accept The Horror Challenge.
author: J.H. Glaze
